review: Bought one at launch.  Don't know why people bash the thing.  It doesn't do a lot, but what it can do it does well.  It sat idle for 8 months before I put it back into service streaming tv.  My sat provider doesn't pickup Dodger games due to TWC being stingy.  Found a reliable streaming site.  Pull up the game, click a button, and Voilla...game is playing on my 60" plasma.  $30 more than made up watching all the baseball games I can't get on TV.  Bottom line....Play with it and you'll find all sorts of uses for it.  And if you don't....$30 isn't a lot of money to throw away.
author: K. Burnett

review: Awwwwww, I have to give this a 1 star, my first, I've only done a few reviews so far, but this never worked well for me. I'd say 90% of the time for some reason, it just never recognized my router, and so never connected. I probably should have returned it but well, I rarely ever return anything even when i should. It seems like a big bother and this wasn't really much money; still thirty bucks is nothing to waste. I considered that maybe my router is just too far away on the other side of the house, and maybe I'd move my router and try again, but then, I use three or four other devices back here in the 'sunroom' and they never have any connection issues, and when the Chromecast doesn't connect, it was never like it connected poorly and just showed a slow or weak signal, it just sat there buffering and never even 'seeing' a router nearby to connect to. It did work a few times, but mostly not and I'd rather it didn't work at all than work inconsistently and get the chance to frustrate me over and over again. I still don't think I would have given it a very good review if it had worked though because even then, it was the first version and when it did connect, didn't have much in the way of apps (I should have reviewed this a long time ago I when this first came out and I bought this) that I would use other than Netflix. I'm sure that's a problem long solved--I suppose. So one star 'cause I guess I got a dud.
